title: Lunchbox Calls in Sick + Amy Shamed at Store + Top 10 Tom Hanks Movies
itunes:title: Lunchbox Calls in Sick + Amy Shamed at Store + Top 10 Tom Hanks Movies
description:
Lunchbox calls a restaurant he doesn't work at to let them know he is too sick to come in and needs his shift covered. Amy was shamed by a store clerk for clearing them out of a popular product. A recent list of top 10 Tom Hanks movies was put together and Bobby plays a line from them to see if the crew can name that movie!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
